item.title: namelist_defaults_ctsm.xml
item.description: Overview: Here we add the default values for the namelist entries supporting sectoral water usage (see groups 1-2 in CTSM/bld/namelist_files/namelist_definition_ctsm.xml).

item.title: namelist_defaults_ctsm_tools.xml
item.description: Overview: This script builds the namelists for CLM. To support sectoral water usage we added two new subroutines: setup_logic_sectorwater() and setup_logic_sectorwater_parameters.

item.title: namelist_defaults_ctsm_tools.xml
item.description: Overview: Here we add the required entries to allow the preparation of the surfdata based on the prepared rawdata dataset for year 2000.

item.title: namelist_definition_ctsm.xml
item.description: Overview: To support sectoral water usage we add the relevant namelist entries. There are 4 namelist groups which are affected by our changes.
